title: DO-96-030: Extension of Temporary Waiver from Restrictions of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) and (f)
summary: OGE extends the temporary waiver of the restrictions in 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) and (f) so that it will remain effective through October 31, 1996, or until the effective date of any remedial legislation, whichever occurs earlier.
